original_text: And all the people likewise cut down every man his bough, and followed Abimelech, and put them to the hold, and set the hold on fire upon them; so that all the men of the tower of Shechem died also, about a thousand men and women.
korean_text: 모든 백성들도 각각 나뭇가지를 찍어서 아비멜렉을 따라 보루 위에 놓고 그것들이 얹혀 있는 보루에 불을 놓으매 세겜 망대에 있는 사람들이 다 죽었으니 남녀가 약 천 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: And all the people likewise cut down every man his bough
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 백성도 각각 자기 나뭇가지를 베었고

sentences.original_text: and put them to the hold
and set the hold on fire upon them
so that all the men of the tower of Shechem died also
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 세겜 성탑의 모든 사람들도 죽었으니

sentences.original_text: about a thousand men and women
